CompanyDescription: We are an international shipping company specializing in the worldwide seaborne transportation of dry bulk commodities. We currently own a modern fleet of ten Capesize bulk carriers with a cargo-carrying capacity of approximately 1,748,581 dwt and an average fleet age of 11 years. We are the only pure-play Capesize shipowner publicly listed in the U.S. We believe we have established a reputation in the international dry bulk shipping industry for operating and maintaining vessels with high standards of performance, reliability and safety. We have assembled a management team comprised of executives who have extensive experience operating large and diversified fleets, and who have strong ties to a number of international charterers. We were incorporated under the laws of the Republic of the Marshall Islands, pursuant to the BCA, on January 4, 2008, originally under the name Seanergy Merger Corp. We changed our name to Seanergy Maritime Holdings Corp. on July 11, 2008.  ... More ...
